metadata.title: CVE-2018-3774 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Incorrect parsing in url-parse <1.4.3 returns wrong hostname which leads tomultiple vulnerabilities such as SSRF, Open Redirect, Bypass AuthenticationProtocol.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-3774` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.4.7-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.4.7-3').
